title: Being a beauty influencer
description: Hear about women who are using social media to change attitudes to beauty

vocabItems.definition: someone who is paid by a company to promote its brand on social media, encouraging other people to buy their products
rules about how people should and should not behave in a certain situation
suddenly started to be successful or popular
very interested in someone, often because of an unusual or unexpected quality
some detail or fact that is considered as true or real
